meanings.definition: A submersible vessel for exploring the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The bathyscaph dove into the dark ocean depths.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used a bathyscaph to study deep-sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The bathyscaph went so deep, it found a hidden treasure chest!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a bathyscaph, delving into the mysteries of the subconscious.
meanings.sent5: The bathyscaph's lights illuminated the eerie underwater world.

meanings.definition: To descend to great depths in a bathyscaph.
meanings.sent1: They bathyscaphed to the ocean floor to search for lost artifacts.
meanings.sent2: We will bathyscaph down to explore the unknown regions below.
meanings.sent3: He bathyscaphed so deep that he almost touched the seabed!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams bathyscaphed into the realm of fantasy and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The explorer decided to bathyscaph into the abyss despite the risks.
